channel.title: left 4 dead expert tank killing strategies
channel.description: any good ones. i have one on no mercy finale using the jesus room place. al you need to do is to run around it and change the direction when the tank does it. and when you have a clear line to him and he is far behingd you. stop and fire until he comes close and then repeat. made me get the man vs tank achiv in expert XD

item.title: left 4 dead expert tank killing strategies
item.dc:creator: ulvemann43
item.description:
Master Chef:

You were asking a question, one with a fairly obvious answer.

And now YOU are answering your own question, which would beg to ask if creating a thread for simple strategies for a game which no one plays anymore was worth creating.

you can’t realy say it as that since it was an open question to the users here. not for my help but for othe users help or just to share strategies.
btw, seen the info on the new campaign? crash course for left 4 dead?

Read full topic

item.title: left 4 dead expert tank killing strategies
item.dc:creator: Sky_Monster
item.description:
Master Chef:

for a game which no one plays anymore

Hah, I hear that! I bought the damn thing pre-release and then stopped playing it about the time they released the big update. That game is only so entertaining. Survival just didn’t seem as good as it could have been.

item.source: left 4 dead expert tank killing strategies

item.title: left 4 dead expert tank killing strategies
item.dc:creator: Garcian_Smith
item.description:
In the Death Toll campaign, the Tank usually appears at the house near the end of the first part (the one with the awesome Braindead reference). Get him at the window on the top floor (outside) and hurl a molotov at him. He’ll usually get stuck in a loop trying to climb on the roof. Shoot and repeat.

Read full topic

item.source: left 4 dead expert tank killing strategies

item.title: left 4 dead expert tank killing strategies
item.dc:creator: Mangled
item.description:
Use the environment to your advantage. When a tank is climbing up something to reach you, unload your autoshotgun point-blank into him, then drop down… the tank has to finish climbing before he can drop back down giving you valuable reloading time. Even better if you can climb back up a ladder when he is dropping down to the ground again.

The tank can also be painfully slow at climbing through certain tight spaces giving you a good opportunity to fill him with lead.

Read full topic
item.source: left 4 dead expert tank killing strategies

item.title: left 4 dead expert tank killing strategies
item.dc:creator: Pokemon_Eater
item.description:
Step 1: Set him fire
Step 2: Grab an Auto Shotty and when he gets close to you fire and then run away before he can hit you. It really pisses him off.

Read full topic

item.title: left 4 dead expert tank killing strategies
item.dc:creator: Jack
item.description:
ulvemann43:

any good ones.
i have one on no mercy finale using the jesus room place.
al you need to do is to run around it and change the direction when the tank does it. and when you have a clear line to him and he is far behingd you. stop and fire until he comes close and then repeat. made me get the man vs tank achiv in expert XD

THIS IS FOR WHEN U PLAY AS THE TANK

KNOCK EM OFF THE ROOF. FOCUS ON TWO TARGETS ONLY. THAT WAY WHEN THEY SPLIT UP LIKE DOUCHEBAGS, TWO HUNTERS WILL POUNCE THE OTHER TWO RUNNING AWAY. AND YOUR DEAD LOCKED ON THE OTHER 2. ONLY AN IDIOT WOULD SPLIT BY HIMSELF

item.description:
Set him on fire and then just shoot him is how i do it if i have molotovs
There’s no wrong way to kill them really you just have to kill them.
and no one strategy is the best.

item.title: left 4 dead expert tank killing strategies
item.dc:creator: ulvemann43
item.description:
func_random:

On No Mercy, I just jump off the roof. Saves the tank some time, as my current GPU sucks and I get 4-10 fps.
I can play with 12-19 fps, but 7 is unplayable to the point where I can shoot a shotgun at the horde, and miss.

cool. just noticed, i’m a headcrab XD no wath. just turned to a houndeye to XD
